title: LAP: Spirits, Bodies, and Structures: Religion, Politics, and Social Inequality in Latin America
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews one of the issue editors, Jennifer Scheper Hughes, on the subject of the May 2016 issue: "Spirits, Bodies, and Structures: Religion, Politics, and Social Inequality in Latin America."
